000 0 0000 	nop


/* -------------- STACK INSTRUCTIONS -------------- */

000 0 0001	pop				<ofs16>
000 0 0010	push_ofs 		<ofs16>
000 0 0011	push_b 			b <imm8>
000 0 0100	push_w  		w <imm16>
000 0 0101	push_d 			d <imm32>
000 0 0110	push_q 			q <imm64>
000 0 0111	push_by_ofs_b	*<ofs16>
000 0 1000	push_by_ofs_w	w *<ofs16>
000 0 1001	push_by_ofs_d	d *<ofs16>
000 0 1010	push_by_ofs_q	q *<ofs16>
000 0 1011	swp
000 0 1100	sav 			<ofs16>
000 0 1101
000 0 1110
000 0 1111
000 1 0000
000 1 0001 
000 1 0010
000 1 0011
000 1 0100
000 1 0101
000 1 0110
000 1 0111
000 1 1000
000 1 1001
000 1 1010
000 1 1011
000 1 1100
000 1 1101
000 1 1110
000 1 1111


/* ----------- FLOW CONTROL INSTRUCTIONS ---------- */

001 0 0000	jmp 			<ofs16>
001 0 0001	jmp_by_offset	*<ofs16>
001 0 0010	je 				<ofs16>
001 0 0011	je_by_offset	*<ofs16>
001 0 0100	jl 				<ofs16>
001 0 0101	jl_by_offset	*<ofs16>
001 0 0110	jg 				<ofs16>
001 0 0111	jg_by_offset	*<ofs16>
001 0 1000	jle 			<ofs16>
001 0 1001	jle_by_offset	*<ofs16>
001 0 1010	jge 			<ofs16>
001 0 1011	jge_by_offset	*<ofs16>
001 0 1100	jez 			<ofs16>
001 0 1101	jez_by_offset	*<ofs16>
001 0 1110	jgz 			<ofs16>
001 0 1111	jgz_by_offset	*<ofs16>
001 1 0000	jlz 			<ofs16>
001 1 0001	jlz_by_offset	*<ofs16>
001 1 0010	jgez 			<ofs16>
001 1 0011	jgez_by_offset	*<ofs16>
001 1 0100	jlez 			<ofs16>
001 1 0101	jlez_by_offset	*<ofs16>
001 1 0110	call 			<ofs16 subroutineLabes> [imm8 argsNumber = 1]
001 1 0111	// DELETED // call_nargs		<ofs16> 
001 1 1000	ret 			
001 1 1001	ret_nvalues		<imm8>
001 1 1010
001 1 1011
001 1 1100
001 1 1101
001 1 1110
001 1 1111


/* ------------ ARITHMETIC INSTRUCTIONS ----------- */

010 0 0000	add
010 0 0001	sub
010 0 0010	inc
010 0 0011	dec
010 0 0100	mlt
010 0 0101	div
010 0 0110	mod
010 0 0111
010 0 1000
010 0 1001
010 0 1010
010 0 1011
010 0 1100
010 0 1101
010 0 1110
010 0 1111
010 1 0000
010 1 0001
010 1 0010
010 1 0011
010 1 0100
010 1 0101
010 1 0110
010 1 0111
010 1 1000
010 1 1001
010 1 1010
010 1 1011
010 1 1100
010 1 1101
010 1 1110
010 1 1111


/* ------------- BITWISE INSTRUCTIONS ------------- */

011 0 0000	bnot
011 0 0001	band
011 0 0010	bor
011 0 0011	bxor
011 0 0100
011 0 0101
011 0 0110
011 0 0111
011 0 1000
011 0 1001
011 0 1010
011 0 1011
011 0 1100
011 0 1101
011 0 1110
011 0 1111
011 1 0000
011 1 0001
011 1 0010
011 1 0011
011 1 0100
011 1 0101
011 1 0110
011 1 0111
011 1 1000
011 1 1001
011 1 1010
011 1 1011
011 1 1100
011 1 1101
011 1 1110
011 1 1111
 
/* ----------- INPUT/OUTPUT INSTRUCTIONS ---------- */

100 0 0000	inp_b				b <ofs16 dest>
100 0 0001	inp_b_stack			b
100 0 0010	inp_w				w <ofs16 dest>
100 0 0011	inp_w_stack			w
100 0 0100	inp_d				d <ofs16 dest>
100 0 0101	inp_d_stack			d
100 0 0110	inp_q				q <ofs16 dest>
100 0 0111	inp_q_stack			q
100 0 1000	inp_char			c <ofs16 dest>
100 0 1001	inp_char_stack		c
100 0 1010	out_b 				b <ofs16 src>
100 0 1011	out_w				w <ofs16 src>
100 0 1100	out_d				d <ofs16 src>
100 0 1101	out_q				q <ofs16 src>
100 0 1110	out_char			c <ofs16 src>
100 0 1111	out_stack				
100 1 0000	
100 1 0001	
100 1 0010	
100 1 0011
100 1 0100	
100 1 0101
100 1 0110
100 1 0111
100 1 1000
100 1 1001
100 1 1010
100 1 1011
100 1 1100
100 1 1101
100 1 1110
100 1 1111

/* -------------- OTHER INSTRUCTIONS -------------- */

101 0 0000	stop			[imm8 exitCode]
101 0 0001	stop_ecstack	pop
101 0 0010	
101 0 0011
101 0 0100
101 0 0101
101 0 0110
101 0 0111
101 0 1000
101 0 1001
101 0 1010
101 0 1011
101 0 1100
101 0 1101
101 0 1110
101 0 1111

101 1 1111
